generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and used by people walking and standing.
- building: Several multi-story buildings with windows and balconies are visible along the street, particularly on the left side.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves line the street, and dense green bushes are visible on the right side.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalks and near the outdoor seating areas.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and one is visible driving ahead in the lane.
- bicycle: Multiple bicycles are parked along the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue directional sign with an arrow is visible on the left side of the road, near the outdoor seating area.
- pole: A pole with a traffic sign attached is visible on the left side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the bicycles.
